headline: Paychex Buyback And Insider Buying Highlight Valuation Gap And Dividend Question
summary: Paychex (NasdaqGS:PAYX) board authorized a new US$1b stock repurchase program following the release of strong quarterly results. Shortly after the earnings update and revised guidance, several directors reported significant insider share purchases. The timing links robust reported performance with fresh capital allocation decisions and board level buying activity. Paychex, a payroll and human capital management provider, sits at the center of how small and mid sized businesses handle...
